properties.widgets.FastFilter-transform: {"metadata":{"spec-version":"1.0"},"configuration-groups":[{"label":"Fast Filter","properties":[{"widget-type":"input-field-selector","label":"Source Field","name":"sourceField","widget-attributes":{"width":"small"}},{"widget-type":"select","label":"Operator","name":"operator","widget-attributes":{"values":["=","!=",">",">=","<","<=","contains","does not contain","starts with","ends with","does not start with","does not end with","matches regex","does not match regex"],"default":"contains"}},{"widget-type":"textbox","label":"Criteria","name":"criteria","widget-attributes":{"width":"small"}},{"widget-type":"select","label":"Ignore Case?","name":"shouldIgnoreCase","widget-attributes":{"values":["true","false"],"default":"false"}}]}],"outputs":[{"name":"schema","label":"schema","widget-type":"schema"}]}
properties.doc.FastFilter-transform:
# Fast Filter Transform


Description
-----------
Filters out messages based on a specified criteria.


Configuration
-------------
**Source Field:** Specifies the source field to use for the filter. If the value in the sourceField is null, the record is dropped.

**Operator:** Specifies the operator to use for the comparison.

**Criteria:** Specifies the criteria to use for the filter. (Macro-enabled)

**Ignore Case?** Select true if you'd like the filter to ignore case.
